content:
Diagnosis:	Endometrial carcinoma

Stage:		FIGO Stage IIIC2 at diagnosis (October 2023)

Histology:	Grade 3 endometrioid adenocarcinoma with para-aortic nodal involvement

Treatment:	Total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy October 2023
		Adjuvant carboplatin/paclitaxel commenced November 2023
		Discontinued after 2 cycles due to rapid clinical deterioration

I regret to inform you that [redacted name] died on 15 January 2024 at [redacted name] Hospice. She had experienced rapid disease progression with development of liver metastases and malignant pleural effusions in December 2023, with marked deterioration in performance status. She was transferred to hospice care in early January 2024 where she received excellent end-of-life care. Her family were present at the time of death.

cancer_timeline.value: Total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy
Discontinued after 2 cycles due to rapid clinical deterioration
Development of liver metastases and malignant pleural effusions

status_updates.value: Stage IIIC2 endometrial cancer with rapid progression despite initial surgery and chemotherapy attempt. Disease progression led to terminal decline.
